Abraham Lincoln had been assassinated by a former confederation major. Was it one person planned it all ? I believe there were the groups of people planned it. Freedom of African American was delayed by at least 50 years.

Because those guys associated with the assassination was still alive. Warren Commission : The person investigated the assassination.

Very similar situation is happening right now. Regular American loved John F. Kennedy but not old power group. It started Hippies movement. Wanted to change what it was but failed and frustrated. *Note : Jesse Jackson was the follower of Martin L. King

Old power group owned military manufacturing. Peace talk was only good for regular Joe not for power group.
Regan and Bush family - Regan was a former actor then the leader of anti-communist group in Hollywood - Bush senior : former leader of CIA
Clinton and Gore : best economic growth in 30 years American History World peace Believers of old John F. Kennedy way
Democratic party and Minjoo : for regular Joe Republic party and Hannara : for old power group
It will be interesting that compare the American History with Korean. Mr. Park, Mr. Chun to YS vs. Kim Gu, Cho Beong Wok, DJ and Roh Truman, Eisenhower, Johnson, Regan, Bush vs. Lincoln, Kennedy, Nixon, Clinton
American was and still is controlled by old power group not by American Dream. Now Korea can make the difference of world power. Korea is that big and smart. I believe the power of Internet and wireless. Korean are educated and exposed to new information in speed of the light.
